alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Yakutat; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 2:43PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN EXPECTED THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... A FRONT OVER THE EASTERN GULF OF ALASKA WILL CONTINUE TO PUSH N THROUGH THIS EVENING. A SECOND FRONT WITH ABUNDANT MOISTURE WILL MERGE WITH THE FIRST FRONT OVER THE NE GULF COAST LATE TONIGHT THEN SPREAD EASTWARD THURSDAY. HEAVIEST RAINFALL RATES OVER THE NE GULF COAST EXPECTED THURSDAY WITH AMOUNTS OF 2-3" EXPECTED. THIS WILL CAUSE RISES ON RIVERS, BUT FLOODING IS NOT EXPECTED. RAINFALL RATES INCREASE OVER THE ICY STRAIT CORRIDOR AND OVER W BARANOF ISLAND THURSDAY AFTERNOON AND PERSIST THROUGH THE EVENING. THESE HEAVIER RATES COULD LEAD TO RAPID RISES IN SMALLER BASINS, BUT AGAIN FLOODING IS NOT EXPECTED. RAINFALL RATES DIMINISH FRIDAY.
